course.name: Build Your Sales – 30 Days to More Deals

lesson.title: Qualification Questions & Scripts – What to Ask to Qualify?

questions.question: How would you apply the "Better qualification = better results." concept to a "Qualification Questions & Scripts – What to Ask to Qualify?" task so the outcome is measurable and verifiable?
options: I create a checklist, apply it to a small scope first, measure the impact, then roll it out to the full scope
I keep it as a definition and never validate it in practice
I skip implementation because it seems time-consuming
I implement it but do not measure or document anything
